price: Do you approach men with lust instead of women? In fact, you are an ignorant people!”
arabic: أَئِنَّكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ شَهۡوَةٗ مِّن دُونِ ٱلنِّسَآءِۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ تَجۡهَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: a-innakum latatūna al-rijāla shahwatan min dūni al-nisāi bal antum qawmun tajhalūna
